name: Eshaan
about: The visionary behind EDTA's aesthetic. Eshaan combines a background in classical art with a passion for cyberpunk futurism. Always chasing the perfect gradient and the glitchiest transition.

projects.title: Neon Genesis Rebranding
projects.description: Complete visual identity overhaul for a major tech conglomerate, focusing on retro-futuristic aesthetics.

projects.title: Cyberpunk 2099 UI Kit
projects.description: A comprehensive user interface design system for next-generation immersive applications.

name: Dishnu
about: Dishnu speaks in code and dreams in binary. He architected the core framework that powers our interactive experiences. When not coding, he's probably debugging reality.

projects.title: EDTA Core Engine
projects.description: The proprietary WebGL and React framework driving our high-performance interactive sites.

projects.title: Quantum Motion Lib
projects.description: Open-source library optimizing complex physics simulations for the web.

name: Thamju
about: Thamju ensures that EDTA doesn't just look good, but sounds immersive. Master of synths and ambient soundscapes, he brings the static to life.

projects.title: Void Echoes EP
projects.description: An ambient soundscape album designed for immersive digital installations.

projects.title: Sonic Branding for Startups
projects.description: Developing unique audio identities for emerging unicorns in the fintech space.

name: Akshay
about: Sculpting digital clay into neon-drenched masterpieces. Akshay's work bridges the gap between the uncanny valley and hyper-reality.

projects.title: Virtual Luxury Showroom
projects.description: Interactive 3D environment allowing users to explore high-end automotive designs.

projects.title: Character Series: Z-01
projects.description: Hyper-realistic character models created for AAA game cinematics.

name: Abhiram
about: If it moves, Abhiram animated it. Bringing kinetic energy to static layouts, he specializes in high-frame-rate fluidity and impact.

projects.title: Velocity Kinetic Type
projects.description: Award-winning typography animation series exploring speed and perception.

projects.title: Sports Channel Intro
projects.description: High-energy motion graphics package for a global sports broadcasting network.

name: Adhithia
about: Adhithia builds the fortress around our data. A cybersecurity expert who sees patterns in the chaos, ensuring our digital frontiers remain secure.

projects.title: Zero Trust Protocol
projects.description: Implementation of advanced security architecture for enterprise-grade distributed systems.

projects.title: SecureCloud Infrastructure
projects.description: Cloud-native deployment strategies focusing on resilience and automated threat detection.
